TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 用于将程序集中的类型定义标记为 SQL Server 中的用户定义类型 (UDT)。

span.span: Used to mark a type definition in an assembly as a user-defined type (UDT) in SQL Server.

summary.span: 该特性的属性反映了向 SQL Server 注册该类型时所使用的实体特征。

span.span: The properties on the attribute reflect the physical characteristics used when the type is registered with SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SQL Server 创建一个用户定义的类型, 该类型绑定到具有自定义属性的类型定义。SQL Server creates a user-defined type that is bound to the type definition that has the custom attribute. 每个 UDT 都必须用此属性进行批注。Every UDT must be annotated with this attribute. 有关 Udt 的详细信息 (包括 UDT 的示例), 请参阅[CLR 用户定义类型](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=128028)。See [CLR User-Defined Types](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=128028) for more information about UDTs, including an example of a UDT. ## Examples 下面的示例演示`UserDefinedType`点 UDT 的特性。The following example shows the `UserDefinedType` attribute of the Point UDT. UDT 按字节顺序排序, 命名为 "Point", 包含一个名为 "ValidatePoint" 的验证方法, 并使用本机序列化格式。The UDT is byte-ordered, is named "Point", has a validation method named "ValidatePoint", and uses the native serialization format. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.Format format) cil managed

param.name: format
param.span: 值之一，表示类型的序列化格式。

span.span: One of the values representing the serialization format of the type.

summary.span: 用户定义类型 (UDT) 的一个必需特性，用于确认给定的类型属于 UDT 并指示 UDT 的存储格式。

span.span: A required attribute on a user-defined type (UDT), used to confirm that the given type is a UDT and to indicate the storage format of the UDT.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面的示例指定`Format` , 用户定义类型的为`SerializedDataWithMetadata` , 且`MaxByteSize`为8000字节。The following example specifies that the `Format` of the user-defined type is `SerializedDataWithMetadata` and the `MaxByteSize` is 8000 bytes. ## Examples [!code-csharp[VbRaddataSQLObjects#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/CS/Type1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[VbRaddataSQLObjects#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/VB/Type1.vb#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Format As Format
public: property Microsoft::SqlServer::Server::Format Format { Microsoft::SqlServer::Server::Format get(); };

summary.span: 序列化格式为 的值之一。

value.span: 一个 值，表示序列化格式。

span.span: A value representing the serialization format.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsByteOrdered { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsByteOrdered : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指示用户定义的类型是否根据字节进行排序。

span.span: Indicates whether the user-defined type is byte ordered.

value.span: 如果用户定义的类型是按字节进行排序的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user-defined type is byte ordered; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置为`true`, 则有效的属性可确保序列化的二进制数据可用于信息的语义排序。When set to `true`, the property in effect guarantees that the serialized binary data can be used for semantic ordering of the information. 因此, 按字节顺序的 UDT 对象的每个实例只能有一个序列化表示形式。Thus, each instance of a byte-ordered UDT object can only have one serialized representation. 当在序列化的字节 SQL Server 上执行比较运算时, 其结果应与在托管代码中进行相同的比较操作时的结果相同。When a comparison operation is performed in SQL Server on the serialized bytes, its results should be the same as if the same comparison operation had taken place in managed code. 当设置为 `true`时, 支持以下功能:The following features are supported when is set to `true`: - 能够对此类型的列创建索引。The ability to create indexes on columns of this type. - 对此类型的列创建主键和外键以及 CHECK 和 UNIQUE 约束的能力。The ability to create primary and foreign keys as well as CHECK and UNIQUE constraints on columns of this type. - 使用 Transact-sql ORDER BY、GROUP BY 和 PARTITION BY 子句的功能。The ability to use Transact-SQL ORDER BY, GROUP BY, and PARTITION BY clauses. 在这些情况下, 类型的二进制表示形式用于确定顺序。In these cases, the binary representation of the type is used to determine the order. - 可以在 Transact-sql 语句中使用比较运算符。The ability to use comparison operators in Transact-SQL statements. - 能够保存此类型的计算列。The ability to persist computed columns of this type. 请注意, 当`Native`设置`UserDefined` 为`true`时, 和序列化格式均支持以下比较运算符:Note that both the `Native` and `UserDefined` serialization formats support the following comparison operators when is set to `true`: - 等于 (=)Equal to (=) - 不等于 (!=)Not equal to (!=) - 大于 (>)Greater than (>) - 小于 (\<)Less than (\<) - 大于或等于 (> =)Greater than or equal to (>=) - 小于或等于 (<=)Less than or equal to (<=)

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsFixedLength { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsFixedLength : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指示此用户定义类型的所有实例是否都具有相同的长度。

span.span: Indicates whether all instances of this user-defined type are the same length.

value.span: 如果此类型的所有实例都具有相同的长度，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if all instances of this type are the same length; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置为`true`, 则与此公共语言运行时 (CLR) 类型相对应的 udt 的所有实例的长度必须完全等于。If set to `true`, all instances of UDTs corresponding to this common language runtime (CLR) type must have a length in bytes exactly equal to . 此属性仅适用于具有`UserDefined`序列化的 udt。This attribute is only relevant for UDTs with `UserDefined` serialization .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxByteSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxByteSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 实例的最大大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The maximum size of the instance, in bytes.

value.span: 一个 值，表示实例的最大大小。

span.span: An value representing the maximum size of the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必须指定 `UserDefined`具有序列化的属性。You must specify the property with the `UserDefined` serialization . 连接到 SQL Server 2005 或更早版本时, 必须介于1和8000之间。When connecting to SQL Server 2005 or earlier, must be between 1 and 8000. 连接到 SQL Server 2008 或更高版本时 , 请在1到8000之间设置, 该类型的实例始终是8000字节或更少。When connecting to SQL Server 2008 or later, set between 1 and 8000, for a type whose instances are always 8,000 bytes or less. 对于可能具有大于8000的实例的类型, 请指定-1。For types that can have instances larger than 8000, specify -1. 对于指定了用户定义的序列化的 udt , 是指按用户定义的序列化格式的 udt 的总大小。For a UDT with user-defined serialization specified, refers to the total size of the UDT in its serialized form as defined by the user. 请考虑使用包含10个字符 () 的字符串的属性的 UDT。Consider a UDT with a property of a string of 10 characters (). 使用序列化 UDT 时, 序列化字符串的总大小为22字节:每个 Unicode UTF-16 字符的2个字节, 乘以最大字符数, 再加上2个控制二进制流产生的开销的控制字节。When the UDT is serialized using a , the total size of the serialized string is 22 bytes: 2 bytes per Unicode UTF-16 character, multiplied by the maximum number of characters, plus 2 control bytes of overhead incurred from serializing a binary stream. 因此, 在确定的值时, 必须考虑序列化 UDT 的总大小: 以二进制形式序列化的数据的大小加上序列化导致的开销。So, when determining the value of , the total size of the serialized UDT must be considered: the size of the data serialized in binary form plus the overhead incurred by serialization. 此属性不应与`Native`序列化一起使用。This property should not be used with `Native` serialization .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

summary.span: 用户定义类型的 SQL Server 名称。

span.span: The SQL Server name of the user-defined type.

value.span: 一个 值，表示用户定义类型的 SQL Server 名称。

span.span: A value representing the SQL Server name of the user-defined type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SQL Server 中不使用属性,但它由MicrosoftVisualStudio.net集成开发环境(IDE)使用。The property is not used within SQL Server, but is used by the Microsoft Visual Studio .NET Integrated Development Environment (IDE).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ValidationMethodName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationMethodName : string with get, set

summary.span: 方法的名称，该方法用于验证用户定义类型的实例。

span.span: The name of the method used to validate instances of the user-defined type.

value.span: 一个 ，表示用于验证用户定义类型的实例的方法名称。

span.span: A representing the name of the method used to validate instances of the user-defined type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此特性指定的方法将验证 udt 的实例是否从不可信的二进制值反序列化。The method specified by this attribute validates instances of the UDT when the UDT has been deserialized from a binary value that is not trusted.
